sec.div: A6. Multi-Sector Planning and Decision-Making for Climate Change and Health
sec.p:
Have you been involved in any climate change mitigation or adaptation planning, or other climate action work locally, regionally, or at the state or national level?
What do you see as any unique contribution or possible contribution of public health in that work?
Did others see PH as having a unique contribution, and what was that?
Who are the other stakeholders or organizations that you think public health should be working with on climate-related issues?
